Class ec.cosm.costume.ContainerSegment 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.cosm.costume.ContainerSegment
public class ContainerSegment
extends Object
implements Named, RtCodeable
Class used by PresentationAlgorithm as an intermediate format. Some PresentationAlgorithm methods require or return objects of this class.

elements
The list of pieces of art and their attachment points for this container segment.
registrationPoints
All the registration points defined by this container.

ContainerSegment(String)

classNameToEncode(RtEncoder)
decode(RtDecoder)
encode(RtEncoder)
getName()
newContainerSegment(String)
Returns a new ContainerSegment, using a recycled one if possible, else creating a new one.
returnContainerSegment(ContainerSegment)
Returns a ContainerSegment for later reuse.
setName(String)

registrationPoints 
  public Vector registrationPoints
All the registration points defined by this container. The offsets are relative to the attachment point for the first element in this segment.
elements 
  public Vector elements
The list of pieces of art and their attachment points for this container segment.

ContainerSegment 
  public ContainerSegment(String segmentName)

newContainerSegment 
  public static ContainerSegment newContainerSegment(String segmentName)
Returns a new ContainerSegment, using a recycled one if possible, else creating a new one.
returnContainerSegment 
  public static void returnContainerSegment(ContainerSegment cs)
Returns a ContainerSegment for later reuse. Call this only when you are completely finished accessing the ContainerSegment.
